title: Kolkata & Bengal
short_description: Stay in restored Raj-era mansions and experience the aristocratic Zamindar lifestyle.
long_description:
Kolkata, the former capital of British India, is a city of crumbling grandeur and intellectual soul. Beyond the colonial capital, the countryside is dotted with the palaces ('Rajbaris') of the Zamindars (landlords) who accumulated immense wealth and built European-style mansions.

The royal offering here is the Rajbari experience. Places like The Rajbari Bawali have turned these decaying mansions into luxury resorts. It is an experience of 'Opium Bengali' luxuryâ€”four-poster beds, high ceilings, classical music, and feasts that last for hours. It is a nostalgic journey into the era of the Babus.

properties.title: The Rajbari Bawali
properties.short_description: A 300-year-old boutique heritage hotel that revives the opulent lifestyle of Bengal's Zamindars.

how_to_reach: Kolkata is a major gateway. Bawali is 1.5 hours drive from the city.
